short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension check the subject of an email from Gmail. If no subject, you will not be able to send the email. Just that!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension check the subject of an email from Gmail. If no subject, you will not be able to send the email. Just that!
